channel.title: Marine Science on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Marine Science on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Central American Beaches Are Being Overrun With Local and Foreign Plastic
item.description: A study of plastic bottles washed up on the Pacific coast of Latin America has identified a double problem—a mass of local waste combined with long-traveling bottles from Asia.
